Articles.Content:
Hey everybody! I have been playing KSP for a quite a while. (Bought it at version 0.14 or 0.15) I'm going to enjoy these forums.

Just one queston though:

How can I get into orbit?

I'm confused about these things you are talking about, like TMI, retrograde burns, stuff like that.

Can someone tutor me? I want it to know also, but simply. Pictures will help.

Hello and welcome!

I've personally been watching kurtjmac's videos in order to get a firmer grasp on this game. You can find his first orbit video here:

I've found most of his videos to be both entertaining and instructional for someone new to the game, like myself! And if there's something not covered, there's plenty of awesome and helpful people on these forums willing to help out.
